Template Function wet_growth_diam¶

  • Defined in File physical_parameterizations.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
float_t wet_growth_diam(const float_t &p, const float_t &T, const float_t &qw, const float_t &qi, const table_t<float_t> &table)¶

Calculate the separation diameter for wet growth of supercooled water to ice.

Return

Separation diameter in m

Parameters

  • p: Pressure in Pascal

  • T: Temperature in Kelvin

  • qw: Mixing ratio of rain and cloud water

  • qi: Mixing ratio of ice

  • table: Lookup-table (usually ltabdminwgg)
